entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low minus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of rain showers changing to 30 percent chance of flurries this evening. Wind north 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 before morning. Low minus 2. Wind chill near minus 9. Forecast issued 3:00 PM CDT Thursday 11 May 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High plus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light in the afternoon. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 7 in the morning. UV index 6 or high. Forecast issued 3:00 PM CDT Thursday 11 May 2023
